name: vercel-deployment-task
description: An Azure Pipelines Task Extension for automatically deploying to Vercel
helpMarkDown: Something not working? Get help here: https://vercel.com/help
author: Vercel

inputs.name: vercelProject
inputs.label: Vercel Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of your Vercel Project

inputs.name: vercelToken
inputs.label: Vercel Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Vercel personal access token with deploy permissions for your Vercel Project (https://vercel.com/guides/how-do-i-use-a-vercel-api-access-token)

inputs.name: production
inputs.label: Deploy to Production
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the task deploy to production? Defaults to false

outputVariables.name: deploymentTaskMessage
outputVariables.description: The output from the deployment. Can be passed to Vercel Azure DevOps Pull Request Comment Task.
